Collegiate Extracurriculars

Here are the extracurriculars I am currently involved with on campus

  • Regent, Mu Chapter of Theta Tau - Currently serving as the President of this professional fraternity during the Fall of 2016. Previously served as house manager, where I maintained the house and ensured it was clean and presentable. As president, I have assigned committees, handled internal affairs, pushed for Academic and Philanthropic initiatives, and offered assistance to my committee heads as need be.
  • Photographer, Beat Auburn Beat Hunger - Volunteered my skills as a photographer to document events held by this student-led volunteer organization. Additionally donated pictures for use in promotional content and volunteered in food drives.
  • Member, ACM - Attended meetings pertaining to professional development as a computer scientist and learned about developments within the programming world.
